Title: Time, Signature
Description:
Oh good, an adventurer. You've heard of Pedgi, I presume? The composer?

No? Well, don't tell him that.

We were traveling to research his next song, when we stumbled upon a dragon named Tempo. Pedgi is now convinced they're the only one who can help us. 

Yes, because of the name. That's really all it takes for him.

But Tempo here is, understandably, too busy to help us. Could you talk to them? See if we can help clear their schedule?
ObjectivesText: See if Tempo would be willing to help Pedgi with his music.
RewardText:
Thanks for talking to Tempo.

Pedgi can be temperamental, but his heart is in the right place. Most of the time.

Objectives.Text: Find Pedgi and Melly at the Everywhen Inn
